Package carpooling_package

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Isubscribable
    interface that are resposible for detremining if you can subscribe or not
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AppRunner
    AppRunner class is the class that is resposible for getting all the data to work with it
    Car
    car that has codenumber , drivername ,capacity ,trips in each day
    CarPooling
    main class
    Discount
    class that is responsible for calculating the discount for passengers depending on their types this class calculate the discount manually by just taking an object form passenger abstract
    NonSubscriber
    non subscriber passenger class
    Passenger
    abstract class that represents passenger , each passenger can have one ticket or multiple tickets
    Ride
    a ride is just what customers pay for to use carpooling system any trip must have a rout and a car and available tickets that passengers can reserve it and passengers and a price of course ( the ride price is different between ticket price as ticket price can be less than ride price due to subscription or it can equall ride price if passenger doesnt have subscription)
    Route
    route that has a start Location and end Location
    Subscriber
    subscriber passenger class
    Ticket
    Ticket that has a price and Ride as each ticket belong to one ride
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    NoPassengerException
    exception that is responsible for checking if there is no passenger with that name
    NotInRangeException
    exception that is responsible for checking range of number
    WrongInputException
    exception that is responsible for checking input exception
